metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7499 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The sbr_make_f_master function in aacsbr.c in Libav 11.7 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (divide-by-zero error and application crash) via a crafted mp3 file.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> no fix as of 2016-10-18 ebarretto> no fix as of 2018-09-28

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
